name: Crazy Holiday (IB GameDev)
description:
ATTENTION:  on Apple devices the audio may not working well or have some bugs, we apologize for the problem.

Crazy Holiday is a Rage-Puzzle-Platform game where an Astronaut from the future makes an emergency landing with his spaceship on the Earth exactly in Santorini (Grece), looking for some Energy to make the departure again to far away destinations.

Help the unlucky Astronaut to recover all the energy for his spaceship, he will have to overcome 10 levels with many pitfalls and riddles to solve.
*During the game you can buy Power Up to make the levels easier to solve.*

**The Game can be played on Computer with WASD  or ARROWS and SPACE BAR from keyboard, or by mobile with a touchscreen button** 

***The Game is also available on Play Store***
